prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, colossal menacing alien creature, (segmented biological chitinous armor:1.2), sharp white bone-like faceplate, piercing crimson eyes, biomechanical wings, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed biological texture, (weathered chitin surface:1.2), (wet organic secretions:1.1), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching segmented bio-plating:1.2), sharp focus, cinematic lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human face, smooth skin, metal, chrome, airbrushed, clean, over-polished, too small
